[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/indexer_reader.rs] [All functions] [Bail macro safety] Does anyhow::bail! properly unwind the stack and drop resources, or can panics during bail cause resource leaks? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/indexer_reader.rs] [Function: get_events()] [Empty result handling] When no events match the query, is an empty Vec returned safely, or can this trigger unexpected behavior in callers? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/indexer_reader.rs] [All functions] [Nested Result unwrapping] Do functions properly propagate errors from inner indexer calls, or can Ok(Err(...)) patterns hide failures? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/indexer_reader.rs] [Function: get_events()] [Version boundary] What happens if ledger_version exactly equals a version where the indexer is currently writing? Can partial writes be visible? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/indexer_reader.rs] [All functions] [Indexer schema corruption] If the underlying indexer database schema is corrupted, can queries return malformed data that passes type checks but violates semantic invariants? (High)
